en.HELP_MESSAGE: You can say tell me a space fact, or, you can say exit... What can I help you with?

en.FALLBACK_MESSAGE: TheLiving things skill can't help you with that.  It can help you discover facts about space if you say tell me a fact about living things. What can I help you with?
